articles.title: Moscow, Kyiv exchange accusations after Ukrainian nuclear plant shelled - Reuters
articles.description: Russia and Ukraine on Friday accused each other of shelling the Zaporizhzhia nuclear power plant, the biggest of its kind in Europe, and laying the ground for a potential disaster.

articles.title: EU readies P45.27-M worth of assistance to quake victims in Northern Luzon - GMA News Online
articles.description: The European Union (EU) announced on Thursday that it would provide the victims of the magnitude 7 earthquake that struck Northern Luzon last week with emergency aid worth EUR 800,000 (P45.27 million).
